title: Than thanglāi čha dāi ʻarai čhāk kānmāprachum kan thī Sūan Mōk nī. Thamma kap naksưksā.
other_titles: Than thanglāi čhai dāi ʻarai čhāk kānmā prachum kan thī Sūan Mōk nī.

description.value: Chiefly lectures on Buddhism, 1968; cremation volume for Mānit Mānathat, 1920-1969, former justice of the Appeal Court of Thailand; includes biography, condolences, and Buddhist prayers.

notes.value:
Pali (Thai script) and Thai.
"Phim pen thammabannākān nai ngān phrarātchathān phlœ̄ng sop Nāi Mānit Mānathat, Thō̜mō̜. Tō̜chō̜."
"Khamthamwat phrō̜m khamplǣ": p. [49]-70.
